title: British anti-war cartoon, 1943
Text:: British anti-war cartoon showing a procession of the war dead marching by national leaders of the Second World War carrying crosses bearing their countries’ names.Year  1943.Publisher  War Commentary.Artist  John Olday.Additional information  The cartoon was published in ‘War Commentary’, an anarchist and anti-war newspaper in London during the war. Several editors of the newspaper were arrested towards the end of the war, accused of hampering the war effort.
